sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
confirms what someone believes
, kaže, da je tisto, kar nekdo verjame, vsekakor resnično.

seg.quote: He glanced round to confirm that he was alone.
This discovery was a confirmation of Darwin's proposition.

sense.def:
To confirm something
pomeni reči, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: She asked me if it was my car and I confirmed that it was.
She turned to Jimmie for confirmation and he nodded.

sense.def:
To confirm an arrangement or appointment
pomeni reči, da neki dogovor ali zmenek velja.

seg.quote: ...a letter confirming that they expect you on the twelfth.
All times are approximate and subject to confirmation.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
confirmed
, je uradno sprejet kot član krščanske Cerkve.

seg.quote: I went to my sister's confirmation last week.
